query:
UPDATE learner_badges SET 
  title = CASE badgeType
    WHEN 'first_lesson' THEN 'First Lesson'
    WHEN 'module_complete' THEN 'Module Complete'
    WHEN 'course_complete' THEN 'Course Complete'
    WHEN 'streak_3' THEN '3-Day Streak'
    WHEN 'streak_7' THEN '7-Day Streak'
    WHEN 'streak_14' THEN '14-Day Streak'
    WHEN 'streak_30' THEN '30-Day Streak'
    WHEN 'xp_500' THEN '500 XP Milestone'
    WHEN 'xp_1000' THEN '1000 XP Milestone'
    WHEN 'xp_2500' THEN '2500 XP Milestone'
    WHEN 'perfect_score' THEN 'Perfect Score'
    WHEN 'quiz_master' THEN 'Quiz Master'
    WHEN 'level_5' THEN 'Level 5 Reached'
    ELSE badgeType
  END,
  titleFr = CASE badgeType
    WHEN 'first_lesson' THEN 'Première leçon'
    WHEN 'module_complete' THEN 'Module terminé'
    WHEN 'course_complete' THEN 'Cours terminé'
    WHEN 'streak_3' THEN 'Série de 3 jours'
    WHEN 'streak_7' THEN 'Série de 7 jours'
    WHEN 'streak_14' THEN 'Série de 14 jours'
    WHEN 'streak_30' THEN 'Série de 30 jours'
    WHEN 'xp_500' THEN '500 XP atteints'
    WHEN 'xp_1000' THEN '1000 XP atteints'
    WHEN 'xp_2500' THEN '2500 XP atteints'
    WHEN 'perfect_score' THEN 'Score parfait'
    WHEN 'quiz_master' THEN 'Maître du quiz'
    WHEN 'level_5' THEN 'Niveau 5 atteint'
    ELSE badgeType
  END,
  awardedAt = COALESCE(earnedAt, createdAt)
WHERE title = '';
